mainHero.title: Services from the
mainHero.subtitle: Highly-trusted
mainHero.description: As one of India’s largest Elder Care & Senior Living Companies, we provide dignity in care through professional services. India is a country of 100 million elderly, and yet geriatric care is poorly organised and hard to access. As more Indians live away from older parents, the need for trustworthy senior care is critical.

items.title: Seek care & emergency services from highly-trusted individuals!

items.title: Become a Service Provider!
items.description: We provide Full-time or part-time services at home for: Seniors & Post-operative care of patients of all ages.

features.title: About Us
features.subtitle: All the best services out there!
features.description: It is an end-to-end healthcare solution that integrates clinical, operational, administrative, and consumer-centric services to deliver efficient healthcare for an enhanced patient experience. GigCare makes elderly home health care stress free and accessible to senior citizens in the comfort of their homes and to their children in distant parts of the world on the go.
